title: What is the density of Oganesson? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is no clear answer to this question. This element has been produced in such minute amounts that its density can only be guessed at (predicted). The previous answer correctly provides that prediction. The cost of producing this element is about $5.75 billion for just a few atoms. The most stable isotope of Oganesson is Og-294 which has a half life of only 0.89 milliseconds. It can be synthesized but it has a very fleeting existence.

Oganesson, is a synthetic element, atomic number 118. It has a predicted density of 4.9–5.1 grams per cubic centimeter. It was first produced in December 2015 at the Institute for Nuclear Research at Dubna, Russia, near Moscow, by a joint team of Russian and American physicists.
